summary: The Americas, including North and South America, make up most of the Western Hemisphere. They cover a huge area with various landscapes, from tall mountains to large rivers. The first people arrived from Asia thousands of years ago, and later, European explorers, like Christopher Columbus, discovered the continent. This led to colonization and the arrival of many new people from Europe and Africa. Today, the Americas are home to over a billion people, speaking various languages and practicing different cultures, with Christianity being a common religion.
title: Americas
